title: Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations               Permits & Reservations       Camping Fees and Reservations  Backcountry camping is available on the mainland at White Pine Campground; on South Manitou Island at Bay, Weather Station, and Popple Campgrounds; and on North Manitou Island at the Village Campground and dispersed around the island. A backcountry camping permit is required. You may obtain a permit at the visitor center, campground offices, or Leland dock.   Special Use Permits Commercial Use Authorizations North Manitou Island Hunting Permit Weddings in the park Commercial filming and photography
